    • playGame

      public void playGame()
      Plays one game of Tic Tac Toe.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representing the current state of the game. This should look like a regular tic tac toe board, and be followed by a message if the game is over that says who won (or indicates a tie).
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String representing the tic tac toe game state

    • print

      public void print()
      Prints the board to standard out using toString().

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)
      This action listener is called when the user clicks on any of the GUI's buttons.
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface ActionListener

    • mouseEntered

      public void mouseEntered(MouseEvent e)
      Detects when the mouse enters the component. We are only "listening" to the JMenu. We highlight the menu name when the mouse goes into that component.
      Specified by:
      mouseEntered in interface MouseListener
      Overrides:
      mouseEntered in class MouseAdapter
      Parameters:
      e - The mouse event triggered when the mouse was moved into the component

    • mouseExited

      public void mouseExited(MouseEvent e)
      Detects when the mouse exits the component. We are only "listening" to the JMenu. We stop highlighting the menu name when the mouse exits that component.
      Specified by:
      mouseExited in interface MouseListener
      Overrides:
      mouseExited in class MouseAdapter
      Parameters:
      e - The mouse event triggered when the mouse was moved out of the component
